body: This mask is fashioned from dark leather decorated with geometrical patterns that emphasize the wearer's fearsomeness. It covers the wearer's face, but leaves his mouth and eyes uncovered. The wearer may attempt to bull rush and grapple without provoking attacks of opportunity.
name: Grappler's Mask
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Head/Head Slot Wondrous Items/Grapplers Mask
